sqlMap.select: select * from OBSERVATION where paragraphId = #id# AND privateObservation = 0 order by creationDate
select * from OBSERVATION WHERE deleted = 0 AND paragraphId = #id# AND privateObservation = 0 order by creationDate

select OBSERVATION.*, SYSTEMUSER.username, SYSTEMUSER.name, COUNTRY.id as countryId, COUNTRY.name as countryName, PARAGRAPH.paragraphNumber as paragraphNumber from PARAGRAPH, OBSERVATION, SYSTEMUSER, COUNTRY WHERE PARAGRAPH.id = #id# AND PARAGRAPH.id = OBSERVATION.paragraphId AND OBSERVATION.userId = SYSTEMUSER.id AND OBSERVATION.privateObservation = 1 AND SYSTEMUSER.countryId = COUNTRY.id AND OBSERVATION.deleted = 0 order by PARAGRAPH.paragraphNumber, OBSERVATION.creationDate, COUNTRY.name, SYSTEMUSER.name

select OBSERVATION.*, SYSTEMUSER.username, SYSTEMUSER.name, COUNTRY.id as countryId, COUNTRY.name as countryName, PARAGRAPH.paragraphNumber as paragraphNumber from PARAGRAPH, OBSERVATION, SYSTEMUSER, COUNTRY WHERE PARAGRAPH.versionId = #id# AND PARAGRAPH.id = OBSERVATION.paragraphId AND OBSERVATION.userId = SYSTEMUSER.id AND OBSERVATION.privateObservation = 1 AND SYSTEMUSER.countryId = COUNTRY.id AND OBSERVATION.deleted = 0 order by PARAGRAPH.paragraphNumber, OBSERVATION.creationDate, COUNTRY.name, SYSTEMUSER.name

(PARAGRAPH.versionId = #versionId#)

select count(1) as count, IFNULL(max(OBSERVATION.id),0) as maxId from OBSERVATION, PARAGRAPH, VERSION where VERSION.status = 'IN_NEGOTIATION' and PARAGRAPH.versionId = VERSION.id and OBSERVATION.paragraphId = PARAGRAPH.id and OBSERVATION.privateObservation = 1 and OBSERVATION.deleted = 0
